name: Sweet Potato Enchilada Soup
preparation:
1. In Wok, combine water and seasoning over high heat. Cover; bring to a boil. Meanwhile, dice sweet potatoes (donâ€™t peel) and bell peppers; add to wok.
  2. Hand crush tomatoes; add to wok with juice from can. Cover; return to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 min.
  3. Drain and rinse black beans, add to wok. Simmer 2 min. Add baby spinach and stir gently until wilted.
  4. Divide between bowls. Top each bowl with 2 tbsp each yogurt and cheese; add additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Hand crushing tomatoes is not only almost as satisfying as squeezing a stress ball, but it also releases all the delicious juice and gives the dish a rustic look.
